mapper.update: update sss_deliveryplace set mg_ID = #{mgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, de_PName = #{dePname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, provimce_Name = #{provimceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city_Name = #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mg_Name = #{mgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, de_PTel = #{dePtel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, de_PAddr = #{dePaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where de_PID = #{dePid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select de_PID, mg_ID, de_PName, provimce_Name, city_Name, mg_Name, de_PTel, de_PAddr, comment from sss_deliveryplace where de_PID = #{dePid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
